snippet: The President’s Strategic and Policy Forum is a bipartisan mix of business executives drawn from the worlds of finance, media and manufacturing....

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The President’s Strategic and Policy Forum is a bipartisan mix of business executives drawn from the worlds of finance, media and manufacturing.

headline.main: Silicon Valley Chiefs Notably Absent From Trump’s Cabinet of Business Advisers
headline.print_headline: Trump Business Forum  Snubs Technology Chiefs
